title: Simulation-Based Expert Training Program for Critical Thinking and Deep Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced specialization in the field (medical/legal/technical) and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Developing deep analytical skills based on real occupational scenarios in a practice-oriented blended learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can decompose and analyze complex social problems presented in VR simulations into three or more stages to identify core causes
Learners apply critical thinking while performing peer feedback-based evaluation activities three or more times using digital tools
Learners can simulate dilemma situations that may occur in real professional environments and propose two or more alternative solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
